trans-unit.source: The MediaPermission describes a set of security permissions that controls the ability for audio, image, and video media to work in a partial-trust Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application.
trans-unit.target: MediaPermission beskriver et sett med sikkerhetstillatelser som kontrollerer hvordan lyd, bilde, og video til å kjøre i en delvis klarert Windows presentasjon Foundation (WPF)-programmet.

trans-unit.source: This permission uses the values of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage>, and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo> enumerations.
trans-unit.target: Denne tillatelsen bruker verdiene i den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage>, og <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo>opplistingene.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission"></xref> class by specifying the audio permission level.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission"> </xref> klassen ved å angi lyd tilgangsnivået.

trans-unit.source: The default values for image and video permissions are <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdier for bildet og video tillatelser er <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage>og <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage>

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En tallverdi av <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission"></xref> class by specifying the image permission level.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission"> </xref> klassen ved å angi tillatelsesnivå bildet.

trans-unit.source: The default values for audio and video permissions are <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdier for lyd- og tillatelsene er <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio>og <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio>

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En tallverdi av <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission"></xref> class by specifying the video permission level.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission"> </xref> klassen ved å angi video tilgangsnivået.

trans-unit.source: The default values for audio and image permissions are <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdier for lyd-og image er <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio>og <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio>

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En tallverdi av <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission"></xref> class by specifying a permission state.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission"> </xref> klassen ved å angi en tillatelsestilstand.

trans-unit.source: If `state` is set to <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, all media types are granted full permission to play or display with no restrictions.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `state` er satt til <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, alle media typer gis rettigheter til å spille eller vise uten begrensninger.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: If `state` is set to <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, all media types are restricted from playing or displaying.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `state` er satt til <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, alle media typer er begrenset fra avspilling eller visning.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En tallverdi av <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission"></xref> class by specifying the audio, video, and image permission levels.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermission"> </xref> klassen ved å angi lyd, video og tillatelsesnivåer for bildet.

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En tallverdi av <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En tallverdi av <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En tallverdi av <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current value of the audio permission level.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende verdi for lyd tilgangsnivået.

trans-unit.source: The audio permission level.
trans-unit.target: Lyd tilgangsnivået.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter og returnerer en identisk kopi av gjeldende tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av en tillatelse representerer samme tilgang til ressurser som den opprinnelige tillatelsen.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av gjeldende tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a permission with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Rekonstruerer en tillatelse med en angitt tilstand fra en XML-koding.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the permission.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding til å bruke Bygg opp tillatelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current value of the image permission level.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende verdi for tillatelsesnivå bildet.

trans-unit.source: The image permission level.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelsesnivå for bildet.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter og returnerer en tillatelse som er i skjæringspunktet mellom den gjeldende tillatelsene og angitt.

trans-unit.source: A permission to intersect with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelse til å intersect med gjeldende tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: Det må være av samme type som gjeldende tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the state that they both describe in common.
trans-unit.target: Skjæringspunktet mellom to tillatelsene er en tillatelse som beskriver tilstanden begge beskriver felles.

trans-unit.source: Only a demand that passes both original permissions will be valid for the intersected permission.
trans-unit.target: En forespørsel som sender begge opprinnelige tillatelser er bare gyldig for Snittede tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Avgjør om gjeldende tillatelsen er et delsett av den angitte tillatelsen.

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelse som skal testes for delsett-relasjonen.

trans-unit.source: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: Denne tillatelsen må være av samme type som gjeldende tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den gjeldende tillatelsen er et delsett av den angitte tillatelsen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den gjeldende tillatelsen er ubegrenset.

trans-unit.source: The return value is `true` when the media permission values are <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage>, and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo>.
trans-unit.target: Returverdien er `true` når mediet tillatelse verdiene er <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage>, og <xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionVideo> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionAudio>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the audio, image, and video permissions are all unrestricted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis lyd, image og video tillatelser alle ubegrenset; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en XML-koding av tillatelsen og den gjeldende tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding for tillatelse, inkludert tilstandsinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en tillatelse som Unionen av de gjeldende tillatelsene og angitt.

trans-unit.source: A permission to combine with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelse til å kombineres med gjeldende tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: Det må være av samme type som gjeldende tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: En ny tillatelse som representerer Unionen av de gjeldende tillatelsene og angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current value of the video permission level.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende verdi for video tilgangsnivået.

trans-unit.source: The media permission level.
trans-unit.target: Mediet tillatelsesnivå.
